H0.text: Who was the first cricketer to score 10,000 test runs. Sachin Tendulkar

H1.text: Who was the first cricketer to score 10,000 test runs. Sir Don Bradman

H2.text: Who was the first cricketer to score 10,000 test runs. Sir Vivian Richards

H3.text: Who was the first cricketer to score 10,000 test runs. Gavaskar

A4.text: Gavaskar was the first Test cricket player to make over 10,000 runs.

A5.text: Gavaskar's 63 made him the first batsman to pass 10,000 runs.
